thread.title: Kohl’s Cardholders: Carters Pajama Sets Starting at Just $4.40 Shipped (Regularly $22+)
thread.title_full: Kohl’s Cardholders: Carters Pajama Sets Starting at Just $4.40 Shipped (Regularly $22+)

author: Jessica
title: Kohl’s Cardholders: Carters Pajama Sets Starting at Just $4.40 Shipped (Regularly $22+)

organizations.name: fs4march  carter’s dog top & plaid fleece pants pajama set

text:
Hop on over to Kohls.com where they have Boys & Girls Carters Pajama Sets on clearance -prices starting at just $4.40! Even sweeter, through March 26th, Kohl’s cardholders can save 30% off their entire purchase with the promo code LUCKY30 at checkout AND score FREE shipping on every order with the code FS4MARCH !
Here are just a few of the adorable sets I spotted… *Note that popular sizes/styles are selling fast, so act quickly! 
Carter’s Button-Down Top & Bottoms Pajama Set – White Fairie 2T-4T $6 (Reg. $30)
ONLY $4.20 shipped after codes LUCKY30 and FS4MARCH 
Carter’s Button-Down Top & Bottoms Pajama Set – White Monsters 2T – 4T $6 (Reg. $30)
ONLY $4.20 shipped after codes LUCKY30 and FS4MARCH 
Carter’s Dog Top & Plaid Fleece Pants Pajama Set – 12 Mths only $4.40 (Reg. $22)
ONLY $3.08 shipped after codes LUCKY30 and FS4MARCH 

Not a Kohl’s cardholder? Save an extra 15% off your entire purchase with code SAVE15 at checkout (expires 3/26). Keep in mind that shipping starts at $8.95 for orders less than $75 OR opt for free in-store pickup if available.
(Thanks, Sandi!)
